description.p1: üè´ For me, studies are not only time for studying but also for personal development in various organizations and scientific circles operating at my university.
description.p2: üîç I am motivated to continuously develop and take on new challenges in PHP programming. I have solid experience, but I always strive to expand my horizons by exploring new technologies and solutions to constantly raise the bar of my skills.
description.p3: üåê My practice includes creating effective web solutions using the latest technologies, as well as the ability to effectively manage databases, which contributed to the success of the projects I had the pleasure of working on.

uam.description: Bachelor's degree in computer science, covering programming, algorithms, databases, web and mobile application development, recommender systems, and data warehouse design.

pp.description: Master's degree program focused on data exploration, data warehouses, ETL processes, and data visualization.

uep.description: Master's degree program focused on quantitative and qualitative data analysis through various case studies from socio-economic life.

headers.usedTech: Few technologies I‚Äôve been working with:

duties.duty1: Development of an admin panel for managing the AI assistant's knowledge base.
Development of an e-commerce integration platform for managing product listings, sales, and offer synchronization for sellers using Allegro and Baselinker.
duties.duty2: Implementation of new features within a distributed monolith architecture and development of existing system modules according to business requirements.
duties.duty3: Integration with external APIs (Allegro, Baselinker) and handling communication between systems.
duties.duty4: Refactoring legacy code to improve performance, readability, and maintainability.
duties.duty5: Functionality testing, fixing reported bugs, and ensuring application stability.
duties.duty6: Creating and maintaining CI/CD processes in GitLab and automating processes using Bash scripts.

duties.duty1: Design and development of CRM system modules based on client requirements, including HRM modules for employee settlements, invoice generation, and payment reminders.
duties.duty2: Database management and optimization using MySQL, ensuring data integrity and performance.
duties.duty3: Functionality testing, bug fixing, and generating PDF reports from system data.
duties.duty4: Participation in the Employee Reporting System project using Vue 3 + TypeScript, including creating new views and performing data analysis using SQL.

pyrkon.description: A robust registration system for RPG sessions at Poland's largest fantasy convention. Manages player sign-ups, Game Master sessions, and event logistics for thousands of attendees.
